definition: to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]

sentences.english: He flew over the Great Wall in a paraglider .
sentences.chinese: 他駕着滑翔傘飛越了長城。

sentences.english: Fly Fish, Parasailing for one round, Jet Ski for 15 minute.
sentences.chinese: 飛魚，水上滑翔傘一趟，摩托艇15分鐘。

sentences.english: I hope this article will help everyday pilots understand how paragliders are actually designed.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這篇文章能幫助大家理解滑翔傘是怎麼設計的。

sentences.english: How does the brake act on the paraglider airfoil?
sentences.chinese: 剎車是如何作用於滑翔傘的翼型？

sentences.english: Hang gliding and paragliding are allowed from the top of Windy Hill.
sentences.chinese: 溫迪山頂允許進行懸掛式滑翔和滑翔傘運動。

sentences.english: Why does an action on the left brake starts a left turn?
sentences.chinese: 爲何左剎車會讓滑翔傘左轉？

sentences.english: A paramotor. In that era there might be a lot of high rocky cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 滑翔傘，在那樣一個時代的話肯定會有很多岩石峭壁。

sentences.english: And in the distance you can see paragliders descending nearby peaks.
sentences.chinese: 往遠處看去，你能看到滑翔傘從鄰近的山峯俯衝下來。
我們去普吉島玩滑翔傘。

definition: Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
Arxan county level city, Mongolian Rashaant xot, in Hinggan league 興安盟|兴安盟[Xing1 an1 meng2], east Inner Mongolia
